ai-tha-ap371:0.3_0: The Elder Tissa related the Pale-Maker
ai-tha-ap371:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap371:1.4_0: Like a freshly blossoming sal tree
ai-tha-ap371:2.2_0: in the last watch of the night.
ai-tha-ap371:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap371:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap371:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Timbara.
